verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> [T'el-upon הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת <S%H5155><s%> han-ne-chi-Lot, upon Nehiloth מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David אֲמָרַ֖י <S%H561><s%> 'a-ma-Rai to my words הַאֲזִ֥ינָה׀ <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD בִּ֣ינָה <S%H995><s%> Bi-nah consider הֲגִֽיגִי׃ <S%H1901><s%> ha-Gi-gi. my meditation

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ <S%H7181><s%> hak-Shi-vah Hearken לְק֬וֹל <S%H6963><s%> le-Kol unto the voice שַׁוְעִ֗י <S%H7773><s%> shav-'I, of my cry מַלְכִּ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ki my King וֵאלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hai; and my God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃ <S%H6419><s%> 'et-pal-Lal. for unto thee will I pray

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD בֹּ֭קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker in the morning תִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma' shalt thou hear קוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li; My voice בֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker in the morning אֶֽעֱרָךְ־ <S%H6186><s%> 'e-'e-roch- will I direct לְ֝ךָ֗ le-cha, וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃ <S%H6822><s%> va-'a-tzap-Peh. [my prayer] unto thee and will look up

כִּ֤י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo No אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> 'el- For thou [art] not a God חָפֵ֘ץ <S%H2655><s%> cha-Fetz that hath pleasure רֶ֥שַׁע׀ <S%H7562><s%> Re-sha' in wickedness אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo No יְגֻרְךָ֣ <S%H1481><s%> ye-gur-Cha dwell רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> Ra'. neither shall evil

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <S%H3320><s%> yit-yatz-tze-Vu shall not stand הֽ֭וֹלְלִים <S%H1984><s%> Hol-lim The foolish לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H2962><s%> le-Ne-ged before עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha; in thy sight שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ <S%H8130><s%> Ne-ta, thou hatest כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei all workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven. of iniquity

תְּאַבֵּד֮ <S%H6><s%> te-'ab-Bed Thou shalt destroy דֹּבְרֵ֪י <S%H1696><s%> doe-Rei them that speak כָ֫זָ֥ב <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav leasing אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man דָּמִ֥ים <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim the bloody וּמִרְמָ֗ה <S%H4820><s%> u-mir-Mah, and deceitful יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב׀ <S%H8581><s%> ye-Ta-'Ev will abhor יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, by בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro in the multitude חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> Chas-de-cha of thy mercy אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> a-Vo But as for me I will come בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> vei-Te-cha; [into] thy house אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <S%H7812><s%> 'esh-ta-cha-Veh will I worship אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הֵֽיכַל־ <S%H1964><s%> hei-chal- temple קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <S%H6944><s%> kod-she-cha toward thy holy בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3374><s%> be-yir-'a-Te-cha. [and] in thy fear

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD נְחֵ֬נִי <S%H5148><s%> ne-Che-ni Lead בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-Te-cha, in thy righteousness לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because שׁוֹרְרָ֑י <S%H8324><s%> shor-Rai; because of mine enemies; הֹושַׁר ho-shar כהַיְשַׁ֖ר <S%H3474><s%> hay-Shar direct קלְפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before my face דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-cha. make thy way

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֪ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There בְּפִ֡יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi-hu in their mouth נְכוֹנָה֮ <S%H3559><s%> ne-cho-Nah For [there is] no faithfulness קִרְבָּ֪ם <S%H7130><s%> kir-Bam their inward הַ֫וּ֥וֹת <S%H1942><s%> hav-Vot part [is] very wickedness קֶֽבֶר־ <S%H6913><s%> ke-ver- sepulchre פָּת֥וּחַ <S%H6605><s%> pa-Tu-ach [is] an open גְּרוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1627><s%> ge-ro-Nam; their throat לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam, with their tongue יַחֲלִֽיקוּן׃ <S%H2505><s%> ya-cha-Li-kun. they flatter

הַֽאֲשִׁימֵ֨ם׀ <S%H816><s%> ha-'a-shi-Mem Destroy אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, thou them O God יִפְּלוּ֮ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pe-Lu let them fall מִֽמֹּעֲצ֪וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H4156><s%> mi-mo-'a-Tzo-Tei-Hem by their own counsels בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro in the multitude פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם <S%H6588><s%> Pish-'ei-hem of their transgressions הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ <S%H5080><s%> had-di-Che-mov; cast them out כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מָ֥רוּ <S%H4784><s%> Ma-ru for they have rebelled בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ <S%H8055><s%> ve-yis-me-Chu in thee rejoice כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all ח֪וֹסֵי <S%H2620><s%> Cho-sei But let all those that put their trust בָ֡ךְ vach לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam let them ever יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ <S%H7442><s%> Ye-ran-ne-nu shout for joy וְתָסֵ֣ךְ <S%H5526><s%> ve-ta-Sech because thou defendest עָלֵ֑ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-mov; and וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ <S%H5970><s%> ve-ya'-le-Tzu be joyful בְ֝ךָ֗ ve-cha, אֹהֲבֵ֥י <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Vei them let them also that love שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha. thy name

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּה֮ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah who תְּבָרֵ֪ךְ <S%H1288><s%> te-va-Rech wilt bless צַ֫דִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik the righteous יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; For thou LORD כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה <S%H6793><s%> katz-tzin-Nah, him as [with] a shield רָצ֥וֹן <S%H7522><s%> ra-Tzon with favour תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5849><s%> ta'-te-Ren-nu. wilt thou compass
